summary: REQ-1 label/value updates for the Google Drive contact item appear to be implemented in ContactSection, but there are additional, unrequested edits (including modifying other files and changes beyond the two specified text nodes).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified files other than the Contact section component, despite the constraint to apply changes ONLY to the two selected elements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest restricts changes to only the two specified text nodes; editing auxiliary tracking/summary files is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes in ContactSection.tsx that go beyond updating the two specified text nodes (e.g., icon import/usage).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/constraints specify updating ONLY the two selected text nodes; adding/changing imports/icons is an additional modification not explicitly requested.
